rows.label: tlk70000052_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Adel-sama, Laura-sama! It'll soon
be time for me to depart...

rows.label: tlk70000052_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I must set off for Superbia to
see my sick grandmother...

rows.label: tlk70000052_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Under the circumstances, it's
heartbreaking for me to leave
Iira! I go with great reluctance!!!

rows.label: tlk70000052_05_msg0004
rows.name:
However, as the others at the mansion
tell me, parting is one of life's sweet
sorrows, and I should not be too glum.

rows.label: tlk70000052_05_msg0005
rows.name:
So I will go, hoping to be
reunited with you all, while
I take care of my duty.

rows.label: tlk70000052_05_msg0006
rows.name:
While I am away, I will continue to
pray for your safety. I will offer a
daily prayer to the Divine Beast!

rows.label: tlk70000052_05_msg0007
rows.name:
Some day I will hear your
heroic tales once more,
Adel-sama! I promise!
